title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Crypto 306 | 08-09 May 2023 | The Ritz-Carlton, DubaiEvent Website: https://crypto306.com/Crypto 306 is the premier annual B2B/B2C networking event connecting the global crypto community! This highly-anticipated event brings together new users, investors, and crypto companies from all over the world to share ideas, discuss emerging trends, and showcase groundbreaking projects.Organised annually in 3 Different Countries, where New Users and Investors meet with crypto companies to know more about them and Traditional Companies and Corporate Companies meet with Crypto Project founders and executives of the leading Web3 companies share their project details to accept crypto currencies worldwide.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: This is really a big event. I just checked out the page, and the attendees are really dignified people from top crypto projects and exchanges around the world. Do the attendees who are not speakers or media representatives pay any kind of money to purchase tickets, or is the event highly sponsored by those big boys in crypto? I would have really loved to stream them live since I can't be there.

comments.author: SamReomo
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on April 17, 2023, 02:57:37 PMThis is really a big event. I just checked out the page, and the attendees are really dignified people from top crypto projects and exchanges around the world. Do the attendees who are not speakers or media representatives pay any kind of money to purchase tickets, or is the event highly sponsored by those big boys in crypto? I would have really loved to stream them live since I can't be there. I have visited their site and it seems a very good event for the crypto users. But, it isn't for free the Early bird ticket of the Event with basic package costs around 350 AED which is at least $95.30 USD to be accurate. I don't think that normal crypto users can have any benefits from this event as the ticket cost is priced so high for average crypto users. I've tried to find that if they are offering live stream as webinar, but so far I was unable to get any information related to that. If anyone still manages to reach at that event then kindly share the discussion with us. That might be helpful for new users as such events are organized very professionally, and the speakers in such events are highly knowledgeable.
